name: tenoxui
description: Tenox UI is a Utiliy-First CSS Framework with small and lightweight size and fast, most of its class is built in Javascript.

scripts.mini-js: terser src/js/tenoxui.js -o dist/js/tui.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tui.min.js.map' && terser src/js/lib/property.js -o dist/js/lib/property.js -c -m --mangle && cp src/js/tenoxui.js dist/js/tui.js && cp src/js/lib/color.js dist/js/lib/
scripts.mini-mjs: terser src/js/tenoxui.esm.js -o dist/js/tui.esm.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tui.esm.min.js.map' && cp src/js/tenoxui.esm.js dist/js/tui.esm.js
scripts.mini-css: cleancss src/css/tenoxui.css -o dist/css/tui.min.css --source-map && cp src/css/tenoxui.css dist/css/tui.css

author: NOuSantx
